name: T.S.O.L.
description: '''T.S.O.L.''' ('''True Sounds of Liberty''') is an American [[punk rock]] band formed in 1978 in [[Huntington Beach, California]]. Although most commonly associated with [[hardcore punk]], T.S.O.L.'s music has varied on each release, including such styles as [[deathrock]], [[art punk]], [[horror punk]], other varieties of punk music, and [[hard rock]].
